search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for DNSFilter (dnsfilter.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for DNSFilter is at: [https://www.dnsfilter.com/pricing](https://www.dnsfilter.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Content Filtering and Protective DNS Pricing | DNSFilter

extracted_content.content:
**Transparent pricing at every level**
--------------------------------------

### Advanced protective DNS and content filtering for enterprise, MSPs, educational institutions, and more.

**Looking for our special pricing options?** We're here to help! Find pricing and more information by navigating with the buttons below.

**Find the right plan and start blocking threats today.**

Save with an annual plan!

Annually Monthly

### **Basic**

$1.001.15 /month

Real-time threat detection, content filtering, malicious domain protection, scheduled reporting, and more.

### **Pro**

**Most Popular Plan!**

$2.102.30 /month

**Everything in the Basic plan PLUS:** AppAware, Windows & macOS Roaming Clients, Active Directory Support, Zapier Integration, API Access, and more!

### **Enterprise**

$2.703.00 /month

**Everything in the Pro plan PLUS:** iOS and Android Roaming Clients, 90-day report retention, 9-day query log retention, and add-ons.

**Basic**

**Pro**

**Enterprise**

**SECURITY**
------------

Real-time Detection

DNSFilter categorizes threats in real time and can spot threats 10 days faster than other threat feeds.

DNS Encryption

Includes DNS encryption and DNS-over-TLS

**DEPLOYMENTS**
---------------

Network Deployment

Configure DNSFilter on your router, Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP), or firewall

Windows Roaming Clients

A DNSFilter agent installed on Windows computers

macOS Roaming Clients

A DNSFilter agent installed on Mac computers

Relay Deployment

Use our native DNS relay application to easily route private and public requests.

iOS Roaming Clients

A DNSFilter agent installed on iOS devices

Android Roaming Clients

A DNSFilter agent installed on Android devices

Chrome Roaming Clients

A DNSFilter agent installed on Chrome devices

**INTEGRATIONS**
----------------

[Zapier Integration](https://www.dnsfilter.com/integrations#zapier)

Our Zapier Integration will allow you to send DNSFilter data to one of the 3,000 apps of your choice. You can also trigger actions in DNSFilter from external applications.

[API Access](https://www.dnsfilter.com/integrations#api)

Includes API access suitable for common integrations and automations.

**REPORTING AND POLICY CREATION**
---------------------------------

Scheduled Reporting

Per-user Policies

Per-user Reporting

Query Log Export

The DNSFilter query log shows you a feed of DNS queries on your network. Our export tool enables you to save these queries as CSVs.

$0.25/user/mo

$0.25/user/mo

$0.25/user/mo

Administrative Audit Log

Keep a record of who has made changes in your DNSFilter instance.

Report Retention

30 days

60 days

90 days

Query Log Retention

3 days

6 days

9 days

**SUPPORT**
-----------

Email Support

Chat Support

Prioritized Case Handling

Tickets are routed to on-call engineers who examine your case ahead of standard tier support cases.

With Premium Support

With Premium Support

Enhanced SLA

Cases have an enhanced response SLA target of 30 minutes for email and 15 minutes for phone support.

With Premium Support

With Premium Support

Zoom Consultation Calls

You will be granted two consultation calls per month using the Zoom platform with our support team.

With Premium Support

With Premium Support

### **Premium support add-ons:**

### Case Prioritization

Tickets are routed to on-call engineers who examine your case ahead of standard tier support cases.

### Enhanced SLA

Cases have an enhanced response SLA target of 30 minutes for email and 15 minutes for phone support.

### Zoom Consultations

You will be granted two consultation calls per month using the Zoom platform with our support team.

Add-ons are capabilities that can be purchased in addition to any subscription plan, helping to achieve the right solution for various scenarios. Pricing is per user per month in accordance with the primary subscription plan.

We do! [Education customers](https://www.dnsfilter.com/industry/education) have advanced capabilities including the use of mobile roaming clients supporting both iOS and Android. For qualified education institutions, education-friendly pricing is affordable to meet budget needs.

Our education plan starts at $4 per year for each student and staff member with a minimum of 125 users. [Contact our Sales team today](https://www.dnsfilter.com/contact).

DNSFilter is competitively priced and delivers high value and leading effectiveness. Various subscription plans and add-ons make it possible to configure needed capabilities to match budget needs.

MSP (Managed Service Provider) pricing starts at $150/month and tiered plans are available. By joining our partner program, MSP partners benefit from discounted pricing, multi-tenancy, white labeling, other specially designed capabilities, and easy administration. Monthly minimum spend is required. [Learn more about our MSP Program here](https://www.dnsfilter.com/msp).

DNSFilter is designed primarily for professional environments. Many home users prefer the ease of use and great effectiveness of DNSFilter and choose to use our solution over others—we're happy to have you.

Because of our affordable pricing with high value, it's no wonder DNSFilter is the solution of choice. We welcome home users on any of our available plans.

Currently, we do not enforce API usage limits on any of our plans. The API access included provides the functionality needed for most standard integrations. In the future, we may introduce usage limits to ensure optimal performance for all users. We recommend monitoring your API usage and contacting us if you anticipate needing higher capacity.

### Securing leading companies worldwide:

![Image 1: J.D. Power](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/JDP.%20Brand.%20Logo.%20Red-01.webp?width=150&height=31&name=JDP.%20Brand.%20Logo.%20Red-01.webp)

![Image 2: Dallas Mavericks](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Mavs-Logo-BW-MTA.png?width=75&height=75&name=Mavs-Logo-BW-MTA.png)

![Image 3: Parkinson's Foundation](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/Parkinsons_Foundation_logo%20(1).svg)

![Image 4: Equinox](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Equinox-Logo-768x432.png?width=133&height=75&name=Equinox-Logo-768x432.png)

![Image 5: Viasat](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/vaisat.png?width=131&height=65&name=vaisat.png)

![Image 6: Fastenal](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Fastenal_Logo_blk_hi-res.jpg?width=150&height=31&name=Fastenal_Logo_blk_hi-res.jpg)

![Image 7: Pendo](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/pendo-logo-secondary-charcoal.svg)

![Image 8: City of Portland OR](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/City%20of%20Portland%20OR.png?width=75&height=75&name=City%20of%20Portland%20OR.png)

![Image 9: Monument Health](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/monument-health-logo-vector-01.webp?width=100&height=100&name=monument-health-logo-vector-01.webp)

![Image 10: Eastern Illinois University](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/EIU%20Square%20Logo%20Black.png?width=83&height=75&name=EIU%20Square%20Logo%20Black.png)

![Image 11: Mediterranean Shipping Company](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/Mediterranean_Shipping_Company_logo.svg)

![Image 12: Nvidia](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/Nvidia_logo%20(1).svg)

![Image 13: City of Fresno](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/fresno%20(1).png?width=154&height=50&name=fresno%20(1).png)

![Image 14: thrive-black-1](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/thrive-black-1.webp?width=150&height=46&name=thrive-black-1.webp)

![Image 15: Cabot_Corporation_Logo](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/Cabot_Corporation_Logo.svg)

![Image 16: Sport Clips](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/SportClips%20Logo-01.webp?width=170&height=50&name=SportClips%20Logo-01.webp)

Customers love us, threats hate us
----------------------------------

We’re extremely customer focused because we want to do right by our customers. At **DNSFilter**, we pride ourselves on being easy to work with. We invest heavily in creating extensive documentation for our knowledge base and backing it up with responsive email support.  
‍  
Our range of badges from G2, Capterra, Gartner, and other review sites put a spotlight on why so many organizations trust DNSFilter for their DNS security protection.

[![Image 17: WebSecurity_Leader_Leader](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/WebSecurity_Leader_Leader.svg)](https://www.g2.com/products/dnsfilter/reviews)

[![Image 18: gartner customer first](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/633485118e6e9ac6bc1162ff_customer-first-gartner-blue.png?width=126&height=149&name=633485118e6e9ac6bc1162ff_customer-first-gartner-blue.png)](https://www.gartner.com/reviews/market/security-solutions-others/vendor/dnsfilter/product/dnsfilter)

[![Image 19: Capterra Rating](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/capterra%204.8.svg)](https://www.capterra.com/p/156036/DNSFilter/reviews/?utm_source=vendor&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=capterra_reviews_badge)

[![Image 20: SecureWebGateways_HighPerformer_HighPerformer](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/SecureWebGateways_HighPerformer_HighPerformer-1.svg)](https://www.g2.com/products/dnsfilter/reviews)

[![Image 21: SecureWebGateways_BestResults_Mid-Market_Total](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/SecureWebGateways_BestResults_Mid-Market_Total%20(1).svg)](https://www.g2.com/products/dnsfilter/reviews)

[![Image 22: SecureWebGateways_HighestUserAdoption_Mid-Market_Adoption](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/SecureWebGateways_HighestUserAdoption_Mid-Market_Adoption.svg)](https://www.g2.com/products/dnsfilter/reviews)

[![Image 23: SecureWebGateways_EasiestAdmin_Mid-Market_EaseOfAdmin](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/SecureWebGateways_EasiestAdmin_Mid-Market_EaseOfAdmin.svg)](https://www.g2.com/products/dnsfilter/reviews)

[![Image 24: SecureWebGateways_MomentumLeader_Leader](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/SecureWebGateways_MomentumLeader_Leader%20(1).svg)](https://www.g2.com/products/dnsfilter/reviews)

[![Image 25: DNSSecuritySolutions_MostImplementable_Total](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/DNSSecuritySolutions_MostImplementable_Total.svg)](https://www.g2.com/products/dnsfilter/reviews)

DNS Filtration that just works

![Image 26: G2_Logo_Red_RGB](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/G2_Logo_Red_RGB.svg)

I haven't found anything I don't like about DNSFilter. I've never had issues with it or needed to troubleshoot it. It just works and it listens to me. Customer support is extremely responsive, gives quick and concise answers with little to no time wasted.

Does what the product claims; good value for the price

![Image 27: g2](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Dnsfilter_March2023/images/632de69aaa6ae2783379b002_g2.png?width=111&height=116&name=632de69aaa6ae2783379b002_g2.png)

We use the product for handling business URL filtering. The DNS look ups are fast and the management of allow/deny lists is pretty easy. Reporting is useful. There are some cool features for granular management at an individual machine level. The price is quite reasonable for what it does. It's pretty much set and forget.

It's raining malware but I won't reach for my Umbrella, but DNSFilter instead

![Image 28: g2](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Dnsfilter_March2023/images/632de69aaa6ae2783379b002_g2.png?width=111&height=116&name=632de69aaa6ae2783379b002_g2.png)

The ease of use and overall ability to block applications, limit search engines, block a number of threat types and add good sites to a whitelist or block a known bad site in a blacklist. Reporting is also the BEST I have seen as it is so easy to find good and bad blocks...allowing you to easily and daily to monitor and update lists as needed.

DNSFilter - A Fast, Easy, And Reliable DNS Filtering Solution

![Image 29: Gartner Peer Insights](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Dnsfilter_March2023/images/62fd0314308e3b39ed19b191_gartner-peer.png?width=200&height=120&name=62fd0314308e3b39ed19b191_gartner-peer.png)

Setup and deployment were super easy. Support has been excellent. Overall, the product is a nice addition to our security stack, blocking threats at the DNS level.

DNSFilter Is A No Brainer. It Cost Less Than Its Competitors And Easy To Setup.

![Image 30: Gartner Peer Insights](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Dnsfilter_March2023/images/62fd0314308e3b39ed19b191_gartner-peer.png?width=200&height=120&name=62fd0314308e3b39ed19b191_gartner-peer.png)

DNSFilter is easy to setup and configure. I was up and running in a day. It works on all OS platforms and doesn't interfere with our end users doing their jobs.

Compliance Level DNS Filtering

![Image 31: g2](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Dnsfilter_March2023/images/632de69aaa6ae2783379b002_g2.png?width=111&height=116&name=632de69aaa6ae2783379b002_g2.png)

Provides client level installation for DNS filtering when outside of the building. Complements EndPoint and Firewall web filtering by processing all DNS requests through an active filter to help stop malware distribution. We can distribute the product uniquely using RMM to each customer and management and controls are customer unique.

Great platform, even greater customer support

![Image 32: G2_Logo_Red_RGB](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/G2_Logo_Red_RGB.svg)

It is incredibly easy to get started. The interface is very user-friendly. If you have any issues, the customer support chat is handy. You get connected to an actual human, not just a chatbot.

Fast to deploy, protect an entire network in a minute

![Image 33: Gartner peer Insights](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Dnsfilter_March2023/images/62fd0314308e3b39ed19b191_gartner-peer.png?width=200&height=120&name=62fd0314308e3b39ed19b191_gartner-peer.png)

Good web filtering for all our locations, we also deployed the roaming client to cover our users when they are outside the company network. It is also our first level of defense if there is a threat as the domain might be blocked before our EPP / EDR detect something.

Easy-to-use DNS security solution

![Image 34: G2_Logo_Red_RGB](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hubfs/G2_Logo_Red_RGB.svg)

I love how DNSFilter is constantly being updated with new features and security updates. This gives me peace of mind knowing that my business is always protected from the latest online threats.

Finally, a DNS filter that actually works!

![Image 35: Gartner Peer Insights](https://www.dnsfilter.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Dnsfilter_March2023/images/62fd0314308e3b39ed19b191_gartner-peer.png?width=200&height=120&name=62fd0314308e3b39ed19b191_gartner-peer.png)

DNSFilter has proven to be one of the easiest solutions to implement. The intuitive interface makes on-going administration a breeze. We're happy to know our internet security stack is protected and the accurate categorization of traffic has not interfered with approved business functions.

DNSFilter pricing available for MSPs, education, guest Wi-Fi, and more. Get details on annual and monthly pricing and try DNSFilter free for 14 days.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes subscription plans with optional add-ons and usage-based fees.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Real-time threat detection, content filtering, malicious domain protection, scheduled reporting, and more.
Everything in the Basic plan PLUS: AppAware, Windows & macOS Roaming Clients, Active Directory Support, Zapier Integration, API Access, and more.
Everything in the Pro plan PLUS: iOS and Android Roaming Clients, 90-day report retention, 9-day query log retention, and add-ons.

additional_fees.fee_description: Annual fee per student and staff member for qualified educational institutions, with a minimum of 125 users.
Monthly minimum spend for Managed Service Providers with tiered plans available.
